title: may someone from riot look into my honor level pls
body:
im still honor lv 3... i dont care about h5 its ugly to me, but i want h4. 
i swear i get a ton of honors and i really dont get why im not h5 yet. all i want is h4. may someone tell me that my account isnt bugged or anything? or just a hint as to how close i am?

replies.body: Kokua is pretty spot on here.  Just keep at it, and it will come with time!

There is no progress bar to indicate how close or how far you are from the next rank, nor will anybody give you an idea of how close you are to ranking up. All anyone can tell you is to keep playing regularly with a positive attitude, and you'll find your way there in due time. There are many different factors that will determine the rate which you progress in honor.
